name: Drunken Snailor
description:
Pirate snails racing for booze!!

Move with WASD or arrow keys and prepare for some heavy drifting!

Complete all levels to be finally done, but be careful: the last snail can't go forward to the next level. So don't be a looser to if you wanna be a boozer!

Drunken Snailor was made with Unreal Engine 4 for Epic MegaJam 2020.

Created by Bence Czanik (tech artist), Csilla Szegedi (UI, prop and texture artist) and Gábor Szatmári (3D character artist).
Special thanks to Attila Góz and Tamás Zángó for the brainstorm sessions.

Also huge thanks for free resources to:
cgi.tutsplus.com,  pixabay.com,  zapsplat.com,  the Epic team for the great tools, and to The Midshipmen Glee Club and Cooper Cannell for their free music.

-----------------------------------------------------------

No snails were harrrrrmed in the making of this video game.
Nor any pirates, sailors, corsairs, buccaneers, raiders...
The makers would never give alcoholic beverages to any innocent snail or other animal, and are barely even familiar with the concept of consuming alcohol in general.

If You are a snail, don't try this at home!
